level.heading: Technical assistance, loans, grants and consultant services.
level.text: The Agency may provide eligible persons, sponsors or such individual, private or public corporation, association, group, organization, Eligible State or Local Government Unit, or any other entity with technical assistance, loans, grants or consultant services consistent with the authority of this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-135
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-135, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-2701.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-247
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-247, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-2701.01.
